committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title XII of the National Housing Act.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to redefine the term "essential property insurance" to include homeowners insurance for purposes of the National Insurance Development Program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XII of the National Housing Act.
